# Shadow Evocation, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Shadow Spells|shadow]])

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** See text

**Effect:** See text

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief (if interacted with)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 340

This spell functions like *[[Shadow Evocation (Spell)|shadow evocation]]**,* except that it enables you to create partially real, illusory versions of sorcerer or wizard evocation spells of 7th level or lower. If recognized as a *greater shadow evocation*, a damaging spell deals only three-fifths (60%) damage.
